name: Heart and Axe (itch)
description:
One adventure, two stories. Play as one or both to discover their endings..

Something evil has arisen in the land of Hykcin. Princess Toola goes to find out what's causing it. The king is furious and sends Orehon to find her. Choose to play as one or both characters. Two endings, one adventure. 

-Single player 

-Heart and Axe is a short 2D roguelike action adventure 

-10 randomly generated areas 

-Original artwork 

-Xbox one controller support
